itemDisplayName: Continuous Deployment to VM Scale Sets using Spinnaker
description: This template allows you to install Spinnaker on VM or AKS. Specifically, as for the VM scenario you can deploy and configure a DevOps pipeline from an Aptly repository to a VM Scale Set in Azure.
summary: This template allows you to install Spinnaker on VM or AKS. Specifically, as for the VM scenario you can deploy and configure a DevOps pipeline from an Aptly repository to a VM Scale Set in Azure.
